DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine whether SPD489 low dose range ( 40 , 80 , 100mg ) high dose range ( 120 , 140 , 160mg ) effective treatment Negative Symptoms .
DOC.brief_title: SPD489 Low Dose High Dose Ranges When Added Stable Doses Antipsychotic Medications Clinically Stable Adults With Negative Symptoms Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: 18 65 year age Has reliable informant ( eg , family member , social worker , caseworker , nurse spends > 4 hours/week subject ) Fixed home/place residence reach telephone On stable dose antipsychotic medication Able swallow capsule Taking lithium , carbamazepine , lamotrigine , gabapentin , cholinesterase inhibitor , modafinil , stimulant methylphenidate amphetamine product Treated clozapine past 30 day Lifetime history stimulant , cocaine , amphetamine abuse dependence History seizure ( infantile febrile seizure ) , tic disorder , current diagnosis and/or know family history Tourette 's Disorder , serious neurological disease , history significant head trauma , dementia , cerebrovascular disease , Parkinson 's disease , intracranial lesion Uncontrolled hypertension History thyroid disorder stabilize thyroid medication Glaucoma Pregnant nursing Subject receive investigational product participate clinical study within 30 day
